attributes.action: Keep vaccines out of schools and obtain parental consent for any vaccine.
attributes.additional_details:
We believe and affirm that no child under 16 is capable of giving informed consent, as per the customs and Common Law of England. We believe government or healthcare professionals must obtain explicit informed consent from parents before administering any vaccine or form of non-essential, non-emergency prophylactic or other medical interventions.

We also believe that vaccines should be kept out of schools and administered in an appropriate medical setting, at the parent's discretion.
attributes.background:
We want government to understand they must acquire explicit informed consent in writing from parents before any vaccine or non-essential, non-emergency is given to their child(ren).

We also want government to keep all vaccines out of schools and prevent any judge from forcing such treatments.

rejection.details:
It's already the case that parents of children under 16 must opt in to school based vaccinations. 

You can find out more about consent to treatment for children and young people here: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/consent-to-treatment/children/
